title: Police: 10 killed in racially motivated shooting at Buffalo supermarket
Britney Spears says she and her fiancé have lost their baby
description: Britney Spears made a devastating announcement Saturday.

title: Liverpool wins dramatic FA Cup final
description: There is something about this Liverpool team.

title: Varieties of Starburst, Skittles and Life Savers gummies recalled
description: Mars Wrigley US and Canada issued a voluntary recall of numerous gummy candies Friday, saying there could be a thin metal strand inside the candies or loose in the bag. The gummies were distributed in Canada, the United States and Mexico.

title: India bans wheat exports as heat wave hurts crop, domestic prices soar
description: India banned wheat exports on Saturday — days after saying it was targeting record shipments this year — as a scorching heat wave curtailed output and domestic prices hit a record high.

title: Jessica Biel is the ultimate frenemy in '80s true crime drama 'Candy'
description: Is it just me or is this year flying by?

title: 4 reasons the economy looks like it's crumbling — and what to do about it
description: The American economy is super weird right now.

title: American free speech enters uncharted territory
description: In China, censors police criticism of the country's draconian Covid-19 policy.

title: Ukraine sends images of dead Russian soldiers to their families in Russia. Hear the responses they received back
description: CNN's Sara Sidner reports on how Ukraine is using facial recognition technology to identify Russian soldiers killed in battle.

title: The Smithsonian's American Latino museum will open its first exhibit next month
description: From labor leader César Chávez's decades of activism, to Roberto Clemente's boundary-breaking career in Major League Baseball, to the "Queen of Salsa" Celia Cruz's music with a message, the tales of notable Latinos who made history will be on display in a new Smithsonian exhibit.

title: Visiting Venice this summer? Here's the best art on show at the Venice Biennale
description: The recently opened Venice Biennale -- an 8-month-long international festival of art and culture staged every other year (though it skipped 2021 due to the pandemic) -- is an opportunity to see some of the world's best artists all in one place.

title: Russian general who oversaw atrocities in Syria led cluster bomb attacks on civilians in Ukraine
description: As she fetched drinking water for her family on a sunny but cold afternoon in late February, Margarita Kiriukhina tried to ignore the booms and thuds of Russian shelling nearby.

title: NFL superstar JJ Watt and Haas F1 team principal Guenther Steiner, the unlikeliest of bromances
description: A hulking six-foot-four NFL colossus and an Italian team principal of a Formula One team are not the likeliest of best buddies.

title: While Boris Johnson faces ongoing domestic challenges, he picks a fight with an old foe abroad
description: Boris Johnson has a lot on his plate right now. The "Partygate" scandal has battered the British Prime Minister's personal ratings, a cost of living crisis is hurting millions of his citizens, and he's assuming a leading role in helping Ukraine fight off Russia's invasion.

title: Fossils of a dinosaur that inspired 'Jurassic Park' sold for over $12 million
description: His name is "Hector," he's over 100 million years old, and his fossils sold for more than $12 million in auction at Christie's.

title: Saudi man charged after Maserati driven down Rome's Spanish Steps
description: When in Rome, don't drive your fancy sports car down historic stairways.

title: How will NATO protect Finland and Sweden?
description: Finland is on the cusp of joining NATO while Sweden is on the verge of following suit.

title: To bathe or not to bathe (often). That is the question
description: My first memories of bathing were of my mom dragging me into the bathtub kicking and screaming. Those days are long gone, and I'm now a once-a-day-shower kind of guy.

title: With eye on China's zero-Covid chaos, Taiwan seizes chance to open up
description: Business has been swift this week for Oscar Chen, the fourth-generation owner of the Liang Xi Hao restaurant in central Taipei.
